descriptionHtml: This Mod Includes 3 weapons made by Me for my own Enjoyment, I Decided to share them with You so here they areJaunpakuto----------My own reCreation of Ichigo's Sword from the Anime Series BleachBrute Sword-----------a Weapon I Created from Inspiration I gathered from Everywhere.. Even the TreesClavicus Warhammer------------------Not in Anyway connected to the Actual Daedric Lord Clavicus Vile, Just thought the Name sounded Cool.. I wanted to Create my own Unique Design for this One and my Imagination ran with MeInstallation------------Usually Program Files/The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim/DataBUT..If You went and gone All Sneaky (which I don't support in ANY WAY *wink*) and Downloaded the Game just Locate wherever You Installed it and splash the Stuff into your Data Folder where your Launcher.exe is.. If You don't know what I'm talking About please go to your kitchen and stab yourself in the Face.. Enjoy the Mod \m/Oh and Please Endorse if You Like and want to see more, it will Motivate much!
author: Jadax4
